scripts.start:rnd: env REACT_DEBUGGER="$([ -d '/Applications/React Native Debugger.app' ] && echo "open 'rndebugger://set-debugger-loc?host=localhost&port=8081' --args")" yarn start
scripts.ios: cd ios && rm -rf build && cd .. && react-native run-ios --simulator="iPhone 7"
scripts.ios:bundle: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle
scripts.android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android
scripts.android:bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/main.jsbundle
